title: Machine Learning Engineer
description: Develop and optimize AI models for real-world applications.
responsibilities: Develop, train, and optimize ML models.
Analyze large datasets for insights.
Collaborate with data engineers on pipelines.
Deploy ML models in production environments.
requirements: Bachelor’s or Master’s in CS, AI, or related field.
Proficiency in Python, TensorFlow, and PyTorch.
Experience with AWS, GCP, or Azure.
Strong understanding of data structures and algorithms.

title: Full Stack Developer
description: Build and maintain scalable web applications.
responsibilities: Develop front-end and back-end applications.
Ensure responsiveness and scalability.
Optimize applications for performance.
Integrate APIs and third-party services.
requirements: Bachelor’s in Computer Science or related field.
Proficiency in JavaScript, React, Node.js, and MongoDB.
Experience with RESTful APIs and microservices.
Understanding of DevOps and CI/CD pipelines.

title: Data Scientist
description: Analyze and interpret complex data to improve business decisions.
responsibilities: Develop predictive models using statistical techniques.
Work with stakeholders to understand business challenges.
Create and manage data visualization dashboards.
Perform data cleaning and preprocessing.
requirements: Master’s in Data Science, Statistics, or a related field.
Experience with Python, SQL, and machine learning libraries.
Strong knowledge of statistical analysis and A/B testing.
Ability to communicate data-driven insights to non-technical teams.

title: Cloud Engineer
description: Manage and optimize cloud infrastructure for scalable applications.
responsibilities: Design and deploy cloud infrastructure solutions.
Ensure security and compliance of cloud environments.
Optimize performance and cost of cloud services.
Troubleshoot cloud-related issues and incidents.
requirements: Bachelor’s in Computer Science, IT, or related field.
Experience with AWS, GCP, or Azure.
Proficiency in scripting languages like Python or Bash.
Understanding of Kubernetes and containerization.

title: AI Research Intern
description: Assist in AI research projects and model development.
responsibilities: Experiment with different ML and deep learning techniques.
Prepare research documentation and reports.
Work with senior engineers to improve AI models.
requirements: Currently enrolled in a CS/AI-related degree program.
Basic understanding of ML concepts and algorithms.
Experience with Python and TensorFlow/PyTorch.
Strong analytical and problem-solving skills.

title: Software Engineering Intern
description: Gain hands-on experience in software development by working with our engineering team.
responsibilities: Assist in developing web and mobile applications.
Work on debugging and optimizing existing code.
Collaborate with senior developers on real-world projects.
requirements: Currently pursuing a Bachelor's in CS or Software Engineering.
Basic knowledge of Java, Python, or JavaScript.
Understanding of OOP and data structures.
Ability to work in a team and learn quickly.

title: Marketing Intern
description: Support the marketing team in content creation, social media management, and digital campaigns.
responsibilities: Assist in creating marketing content for social media and blogs.
Monitor and analyze digital marketing trends.
Engage with customers through social media platforms.
requirements: Currently pursuing a Bachelor's in Marketing, Communications, or a related field.
Strong writing and communication skills.
Familiarity with social media platforms and digital marketing tools.
Creative mindset with attention to detail.
